title: Are Tier 1&2 runes just a trap for young players? (noobles)
body:
i do not claim to have "the definitive" knowledge of league, however my thoughts on T1&2 runes is this.

post getting T3 runes, you will never use T1&2 again. correct?

can only be bought only with IP, which can only be grinded for. an has other uses, (champions, E-penis etc)

cannot be removed, as of the rune combiner removal, and when you have to many, riot support has to be contacted.


i waited until lv20 to by runes myself. on my only account. and would do again if i had to. also would recommend it. at the loss of not many stats at early career for simpler runes (not 400 you don't actually want anymore) and heaps of IP to spend at lv20. 

as i said, i don't know everything, but i cant see a legitimate reason for buying T1&2 runes, EVER. 

thoughts?

replies.body: They're good if you're  smurf and don't want 100's of champions. They're pretty cheap to buy to.
No they aren't I saved up all the IP from getting level 30 on my smurf and I couldn't even make two proper T3 rune pages.
